channel.title: Need Server Host :)
channel.description:
I need a 20/7+ server host for my server. Host must have good computer specs, at least 1GB Ram and around 1.7 Ghz proccessor :o I don't want them messing with server files unless I say so or need something done. Server host will get Half Ownership if wanted, and I will try give anything else they would want :)
If you want to host a great server (in the making) then please post here! *cheesy smiles*
If you want information about the server then tell me.

item.title: Need Server Host :)
item.dc:creator: @nickehh nickehh
item.description:
@nickehh wrote:

I can host, I live in florida, United States, but… eh can I get admin? You must have working complier & everything needed to run it…

Thanks

Read full topic
